summary: Set up Sentry monitoring for all 5 applications (server, app, marketing, client, admin). Configured Sentry webhook system with Internal Integration and Alert Rules for both backend and frontend projects. Enabled Alert Rule Action. Created alert rules that trigger on 'new issue created' for both currentmesh-backend and currentmesh-frontend projects. System is ready to automatically capture and store errors in database for agent access.
current_status: Complete Sentry monitoring across all 5 applications. Webhook system configured with Internal Integration and Alert Rules. Backend webhook endpoint ready to receive errors. Alert rules created for both backend and frontend projects. System will automatically capture new errors and store them in database. Ready for automated error fixing workflow.
